title: Fermat’s Last Stand Coordination Thread
summary:
Key ideas
- A new Dungeons & Discourse campaign is being proposed
- The game requires a lot of background knowledge in philosophy
- Participants can leave a comment with their preferences and contact details

Key learnings
- Dungeons & Discourse campaign requires a minimum level of familiarity with philosophy
- The plot provided by the author is very bare bones and requires experience in constructing a campaign

Key questions
- Are you interested in playing or DMing?
- If both, which would you prefer?
- Any time or scheduling preferences?
- What are your philosophical beliefs?
- Do you have a preference to be in the same game as someone else?
- Can the DMs of the existing groups get in contact with the author?
